sys_element_mapping.value:
sleep 5 kubectl -n boutique get deployment {{action.deployment}} > /dev/null 2>&1 if [ $? -eq 1 ] ; then ./deploy_cartservice_v2.sh > deploy.out sleep 5 out=`kubectl -n boutique rollout status -w=false deployment/{{action.deployment}} | cut -d ' ' -f3` while [ $out != "successfully" ] ; do sleep 2 out=`kubectl -n boutique rollout status -w=false deployment/{{action.deployment}} | cut -d ' ' -f3` done fi
echo $out

sys_hub_action_input.label: deployment
